headline: Inside the Forecast: Trumps endorsement record, explained
sentences:
By Renee Klahr and Steven Shepard
 05/27/2022 01:43 PM EDT
To hear former President Donald Trump tell it, Tuesdays primaries were very big and successful for his endorsed candidates.
Vance in Ohio to once-unlikely victories  but hes also had some major whiffs, like Perdue in Georgia and Charles Herbster in the Nebraska governors race.
Watch this episode of Inside the Forecast to recap Trumps highs, lows  and stat-padding  as the future of the GOP hangs in the balance.
On the latest episode of Inside the Forecast, POLITICOs Steve Shepard takes a deep dive into Trumps mixed endorsement record so far.
Nevermind David Perdues more-than-50-point loss to Georgia Gov.
The former president has elevated candidates like J.D.
